inclusion.criterion: attending St Joseph's Hospice day centre or being visited at home by their community specialist palliative care nursing/medical team and their carers
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adult patients with a cancer diagnosis and their carers
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to understand and communicate in written and spoken English
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unable to understand written or spoken English
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 67-year-old healthy woman with no underlying disease, first vaccination this year. She takes daily multivitamins and anti-hypertensive drugs.
